mean_en: an extremely large, powerful, and destructive storm with very high winds that turn around an area of low pressure
word_etyma: cyclo圆 + ne表名词 → 在圈中转动 → cyclone 旋风
sentence: The lower air pressure in this area increases the possibility of cyclones forming.
sentence_trans: 这个地区的低气压增加了飓风发生的概率。
